title: Script where double o's connect at top
content:
Thank you for offering this service. I’m seeing this typeface used everywhere, but couldn’t find it on Veer or Adobe. Thanks for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080609224628im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/scripttype_3613.jpg)
